arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 2-1 OGC Nice: Mika Biereth and Breel Embolo goals lift ASM to second
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 27, 29/03/25 AS Monaco had to come from behind to beat local rivals OGC Nice in the Derby de la Côte d’Azur (2-1) as they leapfrogged Olympique de…

arts.ttl: Mika Biereth: Arsenal sent another painful reminder about 'disappointing' £4m transfer decision
arts.sum: The 22-year-old left on a permanent transfer last summer and is going from strength to strength following another move at the beginning of the year
